title: How's everybody's Valentine's Day?
body:
* Did you confess to or get confessed by the one you secretly admire like one of those romance anime?
* Did you go out with your partner and have a good time?
* Or perhaps senpai finally noticed you?

Share your (or at least that of someone you know) Valentine's Day experiences. I need that for well, community and research reasons.

Happy Valentine's Day everybody.

.......

(yeah I remade the thread because I wanna try and get the chronological comments, don't mine me. Not sure if it worked though, but oh well)
